results.text_hl: Therefore, it is prudent to recognize @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@B12 deficiency@@@ as a potential side effect of long-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
